articles.description: There seems to be a weird Pokemon Go Daily Incense trick to unlock Legendary Galarian Bird spawns, with many players confirming the method.
articles.content: Finding the Galarian Bird trio in Pokemon Go is never easy and trainers use the Daily Incense each day with hopes of seeing them spawn. But a player may have discovered a way to guarantee these Legen… [+2622 chars]

articles.title: The 7 Most Important AI Gadgets You Need to Know About - Inverse
articles.description: After years of boring smartphones, tablets, and laptops, consumer technology is due for a shakeup. Dedicated AI hardware could be just the thing to do it. Here are the seven biggest AI gadgets coming out this year.
articles.content: In the 2010s, it seemed like everyone needed to make a smartphone. The iPhone was ascendant, Samsung made Android a household name, and it seemed like mobile-first everything was the only way forward… [+10627 chars]
